sentences.en: All the higher - grade engineers have formed a little clan of their own.
sentences.cn: 所有的高级工程师组成了他们自己的小团体.

sentences.en: But he had a strong rival, Rory , head of the Clan Murcertach.
sentences.cn: 可是他又碰到了劲敌 -- 默克塔克氏族的头目罗里.

sentences.en: Here , too , were many of that old, proscribed, nameless, red - handed clan of the Macgregors.
sentences.cn: 另外还有许多姓麦克格隆高的, 他们是那个古老的, 被放逐的 、 匿名的 、 两手涂满鲜血的部族.

sentences.en: Joseph Kennedy, the clan's patriarch, communicated with Bobby in a series of notes.
sentences.cn: 宗族族长约瑟夫·肯尼迪通过一系列便笺和博比交流。

sentences.en: one of a growing clan of stars who have left Hollywood
sentences.cn: 脱离了好莱坞的那帮人数日益增多的明星中的一员

sentences.en: She ranks as my junior in the clan.
The Carraways are something of a clan.
sentences.cn: 姓卡罗威的也可算是个世家.

sentences.en: The Chinese Christians, therefore, practically excommunicate themselves from their own clan.
sentences.cn: 所以, 中国的基督徒简直是被逐出了自己的家族了.

sentences.en: The head of the clan would handle the initial negotiations and arrange for the necessary hostages.
sentences.cn: 卜启丘家族的族长掌握最初的几次谈判,并安排必要的人质.

sentences.en: The hunter killed for the clan, not for himself.
sentences.cn: 猎手是为氏族, 而不是为自己打猎.

sentences.en: The men mustered before their clan chiefs.
sentences.cn: 男人们聚集在族长们面前。

sentences.en: The rest of the clan thinks the uniform is only fit for a barbarian or a man of the lowest class.
sentences.cn: 家族里的其他人员认为,这样的制服只适合野蛮人或最低贱的人穿.

sentences.en: The Wagner clan, he writes, inherited " a glorious but poisoned legacy ".
sentences.cn: 他形容瓦格纳家族继承了一份 “ 辉煌和有毒的遗产 ”.

sentences.en: They sat in silence, honoring the clan Jordache for a moment.
sentences.cn: 他们默默地坐了一会儿, 对乔达虚家族表示了一番敬意.

trans.tran_en: a large group of families who often share the same name
